lines.text: As the producer, I can fire anybody I want, and I am fucking fired!
Get in the car! Now!
Perhaps you've mistaken me for a spaniel.
I've always said the play would be better on a bare stage.
Actually, Hallie said that.
No, I said it first.
No you didn't.
Yes I did.
No, you didn't!
Yes, I did!
No, you DIDN'T!
Yes, I BLOODY WELL DID!
Oh, *fine*, Jack! You win, you've got the biggest creative dick, okay?
Thank you.
I am faithful to the ideals of the party.
I am faithful to the party of ideas.
You are faithful to the idea of a party.
You're a piece of work. A Jewish fascist!
And you, a wealthy communist!
But where are the artists? Artists are the worst whores of all!
Mr Rivera, Mr Rockefeller has told us to give you your comission check. Your services are no longer required.
If you guys are going to kill my joke at least kill it right.
You are quoting from this Marlowe. Is he a Communist?
I am very sorry. I was quoting from Christopher Marlowe.
Tell us who Marlowe is, so we can get the proper reference, because that is all we want to do.
Put in the record that he was the greatest dramatist in the period immediately preceding Shakespeare.
No one should be afraid of an idea!
It's a dangerous play you're in.
It's a great role.
When did you stop supporting art?
I support your art but that does not mean that I must support your revolution.
It's the same thing!
When the storm breaks, the cradle will rock!
Well, you can't climb down and you can't sit still. That's a storm that's gonna last until the final wind blows, and when the wind blows the cradle will rock
